> "PokÃ©mon Can Evolve Into Better Versions Of Themselves. And Now - So Can You."
With Pikachu Task Manager, you can become a better version of yourself through managing your tasks better and never going to miss any deadlines! (*PIKA!*)
## Type of tasks it can manage:

Any words typed in after pikachu's replay will successfully exit the program.

* Represents a test to test deadline class objects. A DeadlineTest object corresponds to
* a test for deadline class objects.
* Tests the correctness of name of deadline tasks.
* Tests the correctness of timing of deadline tasks.
* Represents a test to test event class objects. A EventTest object corresponds to
* a test for event class objects.
* Tests the correctness of name of event tasks.
* Tests the correctness of location of event tasks.
* Represents a test to test to-do class objects. A TodoTest object corresponds to
* a test for to-do class objects.
* Tests the correctness of name of to-do tasks.
* Tests the correctness of timing of to-do tasks, which is no timing indicated at all.
